original: Lindberg, Johan Sam, läroverksadjunkt, Göteborg, f. 14/7/02 i Valbo, Gävleb. 1., av P. J. Lindberg o. Kristina Mathilda Ericsson. G. 32 m. Kerstin Rylander. Barn: Inger f. 33, Märta 36, Johan 40, Bo 46. — Stud:-ex. i Gävle 22, fil. mag. i Upps. 27. E. lär. i Hedemora 29, Karlskr. 30, Landskr. 32-34, ämneslär. i Malmö 34-36, adj. i modersm. o. tyska v. Vasa h. a. 1. i Gbg sed. 36.
translated: Lindberg, Johan Sam, high school teacher, Gothenburg, b. 14/7/02 in Valbo, Gävleborg. 1st child of P. J. Lindberg and Kristina Mathilda Ericsson. Married in 1932 to Kerstin Rylander. Children: Inger b. 1933, Märta b. 1936, Johan b. 1940, Bo b. 1946. - Passed high school exams in Gävle in 1922, obtained a Bachelor of Arts degree in Uppsala in 1927. Started teaching in Hedemora in 1929, Karlskrona in 1930, Landskrona from 1932-1934. Taught subjects in Malmö from 1934-1936 and has been a teacher and adjunct in Swedish and German at Vasa high school in Gothenburg since 1936.
